originalText.text: I don't like that's school because these teachers be acting like their always right like for once accept ur mistake and they always give u a deduction for the dumbest reason and they always like dont  get a deduction for a stupid reason and I'm like them don't give  us a deduction and they always expect u to be perfect and they don't understand that nobody is perfect and they don't be Answering questions in pm homeroom imagine it was an emergency and there was a fire and they don't see it and u trying to tell them and they be like no questions and ur just expected to sit there and act like there's nothing wrong and their trying to be an a utopia expecting us to raise our hands and answer the question track the front sit in star the whole time don't talk and their trying to change who we are our personalities and stuff and they give u detention for being late like who does that and their lunch don't even be cooked right and the kids always want to fight every day there always kids fighting and getting suspended amd they always talking about how we have a voice and that we should use it but at the end when ur trying to explain that it wasnt ur faukt that u got a deduction they dont want to hear it and the only thing that's good is the boat cruise trip and the end of the years trip to Washington or Boston or Canada depending why grade u in and  u get to stay there for 3 days but that depends if u get good grades and ur dream dollars but other than that I hate that schoo.I go to the school so I'll know how it feels.
